title: The Big Local Supporter
description: Join us in our BIG Local Supporter promotion and get a chance to win incredible prizes while making a positive impact!

title: Grab a Prezzee voucher when you purchase any Haier Split System
description: Purchase any Haier Split System between July 1st and August 31st to receive a Prezzee gift card. Click here to learn more!

title: Get On Track with Free Asics!
description: For a limited time, purchase any 2 specially marked packs and treat yourself to a free pair of Asics shoes. Don't miss out on this amazing offer and redeem today!

title: Clipsal Prezzee Promotion
description:
Are you ready for a deal you won't want to miss?

For the month of March, if you spend $1000 or more on select Clipsal products at CNW, you'll receive an Prezzee voucher that you can use for whatever your heart desires!

title: Celebrating 70 Years

title: Buy Local, Support Local
description: In these trying times, it's important to buy local and support local Australian businesses. CNW is 100% proudly owned & operated

title: Your Trusted Partner Is Ready For Action
description: We are of course in uncharted territory, and we must all adapt accordingly. However please rest assured that this will not affect our promise to continue to service your everyday needs
